help: Show or toggle VPN tunnel (VPN room)

effects.text: VPN command available. Try: vpn, vpn on, vpn off

help: Print VPN room topology and key IPs

effects.text: VPN Room Topology (use: vpn / vpn on / vpn off)

help: Query DNS records for a name

effects.text:
; <<>> DiG 9.18.1 <<>> {{name}}
;; global options: +cmd
;; Got answer:
;; ->>HEADER<<- opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 12345

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;{{name}}.	IN	A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
{{name}}.	{{TTL}}	IN	A	{{IP}}

;; Query time: {{QUERY_TIME}} msec
;; SERVER: {{DNS_SERVER}}#53({{DNS_SERVER}})
;; WHEN: {{TIMESTAMP}}
;; MSG SIZE  rcvd: 92

help: Query DNS nameserver for name information

effects.text:
PING {{host}} ({{host}}): 56 data bytes
64 bytes from {{host}}: icmp_seq=0 ttl=58 time=12.1 ms
64 bytes from {{host}}: icmp_seq=1 ttl=58 time=12.6 ms

--- {{host}} ping statistics ---
2 packets transmitted, 2 packets received, 0.0% packet loss
round-trip min/avg/max/stddev = 12.1/12.4/12.6/0.2 ms

help: Trace the network path to a destination (simulated)

effects.text:
traceroute to {{host}} ({{host}}), 30 hops max, 60 byte packets

 2  * * *
 3  {{host}}      14.234 ms  14.001 ms  14.456 ms

help: Test TCP connectivity to a host/port

effects.text:
Trying {{host}}:{{port}}...
Connected to {{host}}.
Escape character is '^]'.
